6874  /**
6875   * Initialize JavaScript to build and open window
6876   */
6877  function echo_modalwindow_js()
6878  {
6879      global $AdminUI, $Blog, $modal_window_js_initialized;
6880  
6881      if( ! empty( $modal_window_js_initialized ) )
6882      { // Don't print out these functions twice
6883          return;
6884      }
6885  
6886      // TODO: asimo> Should not use AdminUI templates for the openModalWindow function. The style part should be handled by css.
6887      if( is_admin_page() && isset( $AdminUI ) && $AdminUI->get_template( 'modal_window_js_func' ) !== false )
6888      { // Use the modal functions from back-office skin
6889          $skin_modal_window_js_func = $AdminUI->get_template( 'modal_window_js_func' );
6890      }
6891      elseif( ! is_admin_page() && ! empty( $Blog ) )
6892      { // Use the modal functions from front-office skin
6893          $blog_skin_ID = $Blog->get_skin_ID();
6894          $SkinCache = & get_SkinCache();
6895          $Skin = & $SkinCache->get_by_ID( $blog_skin_ID, false, false );
6896          if( $Skin && $Skin->get_template( 'modal_window_js_func' ) !== false )
6897          {
6898              $skin_modal_window_js_func = $Skin->get_template( 'modal_window_js_func' );
6899          }
6900      }
6901  
6902      if( ! empty( $skin_modal_window_js_func ) && is_string( $skin_modal_window_js_func ) && function_exists( $skin_modal_window_js_func ) )
6903      { // Call skin function only if it exists
6904          call_user_func( $skin_modal_window_js_func );
6905          $modal_window_js_initialized = true;
6906          return;
6907      }
6908  
6909      echo <<< JS_CODE
6910  /*
6911   * Build and open modal window
6912   *
6913   * @param string HTML content
6914   * @param string Width value in css format
6915   * @param boolean TRUE - to use transparent template
6916   * @param string Title of modal window (Used in bootstrap)
6917   * @param string|boolean Button to submit a form (Used in bootstrap), FALSE - to hide bottom panel with buttons
6918   */
6919  function openModalWindow( body_html, width, height, transparent, title, button )
6920  {
6921      var overlay_class = 'overlay_page_active';
6922      if( typeof transparent != 'undefined' && transparent == true )
6923      {
6924          overlay_class = 'overlay_page_active_transparent';
6925      }
6926  
6927      if( typeof width == 'undefined' )
6928      {
6929          width = '560px';
6930      }
6931      var style_height = '';
6932      if( typeof height != 'undefined' && ( height > 0 || height != '' ) )
6933      {
6934          style_height = ' style="height:' + height + '"';
6935      }
6936      if( jQuery( '#overlay_page' ).length > 0 )
6937      { // placeholder already exist
6938          jQuery( '#overlay_page' ).html( body_html );
6939          return;
6940      }
6941      // add placeholder for form:
6942      jQuery( 'body' ).append( '<div id="screen_mask"></div><div id="overlay_wrap" style="width:' + width + '"><div id="overlay_layout"><div id="overlay_page"' + style_height + '></div></div></div>' );
6943      jQuery( '#screen_mask' ).fadeTo(1,0.5).fadeIn(200);
6944      jQuery( '#overlay_page' ).html( body_html ).addClass( overlay_class );
6945      jQuery( document ).on( 'click', '#close_button, #screen_mask, #overlay_page', function( e )
6946      {
6947          if( jQuery( this ).attr( 'id' ) == 'overlay_page' )
6948          {
6949              var form_obj = jQuery( '#overlay_page form' );
6950              if( form_obj.length )
6951              {
6952                  var top = form_obj.position().top + jQuery( '#overlay_wrap' ).position().top;
6953                  var bottom = top + form_obj.height();
6954                  if( ! ( e.clientY > top && e.clientY < bottom ) )
6955                  {
6956                      closeModalWindow();
6957                  }
6958              }
6959              return true;
6960          }
6961          closeModalWindow();
6962          return false;
6963      } );
6964  }
6965  
6966  /**
6967   * Close modal window
6968   */
6969  function closeModalWindow( document_obj )
6970  {
6971      if( typeof( document_obj ) == 'undefined' )
6972      {
6973          document_obj = window.document;
6974      }
6975  
6976      jQuery( '#overlay_page', document_obj ).hide();
6977      jQuery( '.action_messages', document_obj).remove();
6978      jQuery( '#server_messages', document_obj ).insertBefore( '.first_payload_block' );
6979      jQuery( '#overlay_wrap', document_obj ).remove();
6980      jQuery( '#screen_mask', document_obj ).remove();
6981      return false;
6982  }
6983  
6984  // Close ajax popup if Escape key is pressed:
6985  jQuery(document).keyup(function(e)
6986  {
6987      if( e.keyCode == 27 )
6988      {
6989          closeModalWindow();
6990      }
6991  } );
6992  JS_CODE;
6993  
6994      $modal_window_js_initialized = true;
6995  }

6997  /**
6998   * Initialize JavaScript to build and open window for bootstrap skins
6999   */
7000  function echo_modalwindow_js_bootstrap()
7001  {
7002  ?>
7003  var modal_window_js_initialized = false;
7004  /*
7005   * Build and open madal window
7006   *
7007   * @param string HTML content
7008   * @param string Width value in css format
7009   * @param boolean TRUE - to use transparent template
7010   * @param string Title of modal window (Used in bootstrap)
7011   * @param string|boolean Button to submit a form (Used in bootstrap), FALSE - to hide bottom panel with buttons
7012   * @param boolean FALSE by default, TRUE - to don't remove bootstrap panels
7013   * @param boolean TRUE - to clear all previous windows
7014   */
7015  function openModalWindow( body_html, width, height, transparent, title, buttons, is_new_window, keep_panels )
7016  {
7017      var style_width = ( typeof( width ) == 'undefined' || width == 'auto' ) ? '' : 'width:' + width + ';';
7018      var style_height = ( typeof( height ) == 'undefined' || height == 0 || height == '' ) ? '': 'height:' + height;
7019      var style_height_fixed = style_height.match( /%$/i ) ? ' style="height:100%;overflow:hidden;"' : '';
7020      var style_body_height = height.match( /px/i ) ? ' style="min-height:' + ( height.replace( 'px', '' ) - 157 ) + 'px"' : '';
7021      var use_buttons = ( typeof( buttons ) == 'undefined' || buttons != false );
7022  
7023      if( typeof( buttons ) != 'undefined' && buttons != '' )
7024      {
7025          if( typeof( buttons ) == 'object' )
7026          { // Specific button with params
7027              var button_title = buttons[0];
7028              var button_class = buttons[1];
7029              var button_form = typeof( buttons[2] ) == 'undefined' ? 'form' : buttons[2];
7030          }
7031          else
7032          { // Standard button to submit a single form
7033              var button_title = buttons;
7034              var button_class = 'btn-primary';
7035              var button_form = 'form';
7036          }
7037      }
7038  
7039      if( typeof( is_new_window ) != 'undefined' && is_new_window )
7040      { // Clear previous opened window
7041          jQuery( '#modal_window' ).remove();
7042      }
7043  
7044      if( jQuery( '#modal_window' ).length == 0 )
7045      { // Build modal window
7046          var modal_html = '<div id="modal_window" class="modal fade" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-hidden="true"><div class="modal-dialog" style="' + style_width + style_height +'"><div class="modal-content"' + style_height_fixed + '>';
7047          if( typeof title != 'undefined' && title != '' )
7048          {
7049              modal_html += '<div class="modal-header">' +
7050                      '<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>' +
7051                      '<h4 class="modal-title">' + title + '</h4>' +
7052                  '</div>';
7053          }
7054          modal_html += '<div class="modal-body"' + style_height_fixed + style_body_height + '>' + body_html + '</div>';
7055  
7056          if( use_buttons )
7057          {
7058              modal_html += '<div class="modal-footer">';
7059              if( typeof( buttons ) != 'undefined' && buttons != '' )
7060              {
7061                  modal_html += '<button class="btn ' + button_class + '" type="submit" style="display:none">' + button_title + '</button>';
7062              }
7063              modal_html += '<button class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true"><?php echo TS_( 'Close' ) ?></button></div>';
7064          }
7065          modal_html += '</div></div></div>';
7066          jQuery( 'body' ).append( modal_html );
7067      }
7068      else
7069      { // Use existing modal window
7070          jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-body' ).html( body_html );
7071      }
7072  
7073      if( use_buttons )
7074      {
7075          if( typeof( keep_panels ) == 'undefined' || ! keep_panels )
7076          { // Remove these elements, they are displayed as title and button of modal window
7077              jQuery( '#modal_window legend' ).remove();
7078              jQuery( '#modal_window #close_button' ).remove();
7079              jQuery( '#modal_window .panel, #modal_window .panel-body' ).removeClass( 'panel panel-default panel-body' );
7080          }
7081  
7082          if( jQuery( '#modal_window ' + button_form + ' input[type=submit]' ).length == 0 )
7083          { // Hide a submit button in the footer if real submit input doesn't exist
7084              jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-footer button[type=submit]' ).hide();
7085          }
7086          else
7087          {
7088              jQuery( '#modal_window ' + button_form + ' input[type=submit]' ).hide();
7089              jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-footer button[type=submit]' ).show();
7090          }
7091  
7092          jQuery( '#modal_window' + button_form ).change( function()
7093          { // Find the submit inputs when html is changed
7094              var input_submit = jQuery( this ).find( 'input[type=submit]' )
7095              if( input_submit.length > 0 )
7096              { // Hide a real submit input and Show button of footer
7097                  input_submit.hide();
7098                  jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-footer button[type=submit]' ).show();
7099              }
7100              else
7101              { // Hide button of footer if real submit input doesn't exist
7102                  jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-footer button[type=submit]' ).hide();
7103              }
7104          } );
7105  
7106          jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-footer button[type=submit]' ).click( function()
7107          { // Copy a click event from real submit input to button of footer
7108              jQuery( '#modal_window ' + button_form + ' input[type=submit]' ).click();
7109          } );
7110      }
7111  
7112      jQuery( '#modal_window ' + button_form + ' a.btn' ).each( function()
7113      { // Move all buttons to the footer
7114          jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-footer' ).prepend( '<a href=' + jQuery( this ).attr( 'href' ) + '>' +
7115              '<button type="button" class="' + jQuery( this ).attr( 'class' ) + '">' +
7116              jQuery( this ).html() +
7117              '</button></a>' );
7118          jQuery( this ).remove();
7119      } );
7120  
7121      if( jQuery( '#modal_window ' + button_form + ' #current_modal_title' ).length > 0 )
7122      { // Change window title
7123          jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-title' ).html( jQuery( '#modal_window ' + button_form + ' #current_modal_title' ).html() );
7124      }
7125  
7126      // Init modal window and show
7127      var options = {};
7128      if( modal_window_js_initialized )
7129      {
7130          options = 'show';
7131      }
7132      jQuery( '#modal_window' ).modal( options );
7133      if( style_width == '' )
7134      {
7135          jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-dialog' ).css( { 'display': 'table', 'width': 'auto' } );
7136          jQuery( '#modal_window .modal-dialog .modal-content' ).css( { 'display': 'table-cell' } );
7137      }
7138  
7139      jQuery( '#modal_window').on( 'hidden', function ()
7140      { // Remove modal window on hide event to draw new window in next time with new title and button
7141          jQuery( this ).remove();
7142      } );
7143  
7144      modal_window_js_initialized = true;
7145  }
7146  
7147  /**
7148   * Close modal window
7149   *
7150   * @param object Document object
7151   */
7152  function closeModalWindow( document_obj )
7153  {
7154      if( typeof( document_obj ) == 'undefined' )
7155      {
7156          document_obj = window.document;
7157      }
7158  
7159      jQuery( '#modal_window', document_obj ).remove();
7160  
7161      return false;
7162  }
7163  <?php
7164  } // end of echo_modalwindow_js_bootstrap

7189  /**
7190   * Get icon to collapse/expand fieldset
7191   *
7192   * @param string ID of fieldset
7193   * @param array Params
7194   * @return string Icon with hidden input field
7195   */
7196  function get_fieldset_folding_icon( $id, $params = array() )
7197  {
7198      if( ! is_logged_in() )
7199      { // Only loggedin users can fold fieldset
7200          return;
7201      }
7202  
7203      $params = array_merge( array(
7204              'before'    => '',
7205              'after'     => ' ',
7206              'deny_fold' => false, // TRUE to don't allow fold the block and keep it opened always on page loading
7207          ), $params );
7208  
7209      if( $params['deny_fold'] )
7210      { // Deny folding for this case
7211          $value = 0;
7212      }
7213      else
7214      { // Get the fold value from user settings
7215          global $UserSettings, $Blog;
7216          if( empty( $Blog ) )
7217          { // Get user setting value
7218              $value = intval( $UserSettings->get( 'fold_'.$id ) );
7219          }
7220          else
7221          { // Get user-collection setting
7222              $value = intval( $UserSettings->get_collection_setting( 'fold_'.$id, $Blog->ID ) );
7223          }
7224      }
7225  
7226      // Icon
7227      if( $value )
7228      {
7229          $icon_current = 'filters_show';
7230          $icon_reverse = 'filters_hide';
7231          $title_reverse = T_('Collapse');
7232      }
7233      else
7234      {
7235          $icon_current = 'filters_hide';
7236          $icon_reverse = 'filters_show';
7237          $title_reverse = T_('Expand');
7238      }
7239      $icon = get_icon( $icon_current, 'imgtag', array(
7240              'id'         => 'icon_folding_'.$id,
7241              'data-xy'    => get_icon( $icon_reverse, 'xy' ),
7242              'data-title' => format_to_output( $title_reverse, 'htmlattr' ),
7243          ) );
7244  
7245      // Hidden input to store current value of the folding status
7246      $hidden_input = '<input type="hidden" name="folding_values['.$id.']" id="folding_value_'.$id.'" value="'.$value.'" />';
7247  
7248      return $hidden_input.$params['before'].$icon.$params['after'];
7249  }
7250  
7251  
7252  /**
7253   * Output JavaScript code to collapse/expand fieldset
7254   */
7255  function echo_fieldset_folding_js()
7256  {
7257      if( ! is_logged_in() )
7258      { // Only loggedin users can fold fieldset
7259          return;
7260      }
7261  
7262  ?>
7263  <script type="text/javascript">
7264  jQuery( 'span[id^=icon_folding_], span[id^=title_folding_]' ).click( function()
7265  {
7266      var is_icon = jQuery( this ).attr( 'id' ).match( /^icon_folding_/ );
7267      var wrapper_obj = jQuery( this ).closest( '.fieldset_wrapper' );
7268      var value_obj = is_icon ? jQuery( this ).prev() : jQuery( this ).prev().prev();
7269  
7270      if( wrapper_obj.length == 0 || value_obj.length == 0 )
7271      { // Invalid layout
7272          return false;
7273      }
7274  
7275      if( value_obj.val() == '1' )
7276      { // Collapse
7277          wrapper_obj.removeClass( 'folded' );
7278          value_obj.val( '0' );
7279      }
7280      else
7281      { // Expand
7282          wrapper_obj.addClass( 'folded' );
7283          value_obj.val( '1' );
7284      }
7285  
7286      // Change icon image
7287      var clickimg = is_icon ? jQuery( this ) : jQuery( this ).prev();
7288      if( clickimg.hasClass( 'fa' ) || clickimg.hasClass( 'glyphicon' ) )
7289      { // Fontawesome icon | Glyph bootstrap icon
7290          if( clickimg.data( 'toggle' ) != '' )
7291          { // This icon has a class name to toggle
7292              var icon_prefix = ( clickimg.hasClass( 'fa' ) ? 'fa' : 'glyphicon' );
7293              if( clickimg.data( 'toggle-orig-class' ) == undefined )
7294              { // Store original class name in data
7295                  clickimg.data( 'toggle-orig-class', clickimg.attr( 'class' ).replace( new RegExp( '^'+icon_prefix+' (.+)$', 'g' ), '$1' ) );
7296              }
7297              if( clickimg.hasClass( clickimg.data( 'toggle-orig-class' ) ) )
7298              { // Replace original class name with exnpanded
7299                  clickimg.removeClass( clickimg.data( 'toggle-orig-class' ) )
7300                      .addClass( icon_prefix + '-' + clickimg.data( 'toggle' ) );
7301              }
7302              else
7303              { // Revert back original class
7304                  clickimg.removeClass( icon_prefix + '-' + clickimg.data( 'toggle' ) )
7305                      .addClass( clickimg.data( 'toggle-orig-class' ) );
7306              }
7307          }
7308      }
7309      else
7310      { // Sprite icon
7311          var icon_bg_pos = clickimg.css( 'background-position' );
7312          clickimg.css( 'background-position', clickimg.data( 'xy' ) );
7313          clickimg.data( 'xy', icon_bg_pos );
7314      }
7315  
7316      // Toggle title
7317      var title = clickimg.attr( 'title' );
7318      clickimg.attr( 'title', clickimg.data( 'title' ) );
7319      clickimg.data( 'title', title );
7320  } );
7321  
7322  jQuery( 'input[type=hidden][id^=folding_value_]' ).each( function()
7323  { // Check each feildset is folded correctly after refresh a page
7324      var wrapper_obj = jQuery( this ).closest( '.fieldset_wrapper' );
7325      if( jQuery( this ).val() == '1' )
7326      { // Collapse
7327          wrapper_obj.addClass( 'folded' );
7328      }
7329      else
7330      { // Expand
7331          wrapper_obj.removeClass( 'folded' );
7332      }
7333  } );
7334  
7335  // Expand all fieldsets that have the fields with error
7336  jQuery( '.field_error' ).closest( '.fieldset_wrapper.folded' ).find( 'span[id^=icon_folding_]' ).click();
7337  </script>
7338  <?php
7339  }
7340

7342  /**
7343   * Save the values of fieldset folding into DB
7344   *
7345   * @param integer Blog ID is used to save setting per blog, NULL- to don't save per blog
7346   */
7347  function save_fieldset_folding_values( $blog_ID = NULL )
7348  {
7349      if( ! is_logged_in() )
7350      { // Only loggedin users can fold fieldset
7351          return;
7352      }
7353  
7354      $folding_values = param( 'folding_values', 'array:integer' );
7355  
7356      if( empty( $folding_values ) )
7357      { // No folding values go from request, Exit here
7358          return;
7359      }
7360  
7361      global $UserSettings;
7362  
7363      foreach( $folding_values as $key => $value )
7364      {
7365          $setting_name = 'fold_'.$key;
7366          if( $blog_ID !== NULL )
7367          { // Save setting per blog
7368              $setting_name .= '_'.$blog_ID;
7369          }
7370          $UserSettings->set( $setting_name, $value );
7371      }
7372  
7373      // Update the folding setting for current user
7374      $UserSettings->dbupdate();
7375  }

7378  /**
7379   * Get html code of bootstrap dropdown element
7380   * 
7381   * @param array Params
7382   */
7383  function get_status_dropdown_button( $params = array() )
7384  {
7385      $params = array_merge( array(
7386              'name'         => '',
7387              'value'        => '',
7388              'title_format' => '',
7389              'options'      => NULL,
7390          ), $params );
7391  
7392      if( $params['options'] === NULL )
7393      {    // Get status options by title format:
7394          $status_options = get_visibility_statuses( $params['title_format'] );
7395      }
7396      else
7397      {    // Use status options from params:
7398          $status_options = $params['options'];
7399      }
7400      $status_icon_options = get_visibility_statuses( 'icons' );
7401  
7402      $r = '<div class="btn-group dropdown autoselected">';
7403      $r .= '<button type="button" class="btn btn-status-'.$params['value'].' dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-expanded="false">'
7404                      .'<span>'.$status_options[ $params['value'] ].'</span>'
7405                  .' <span class="caret"></span></button>';
7406      $r .= '<ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu" aria-labelledby="'.$params['name'].'">';
7407      foreach( $status_options as $status_key => $status_title )
7408      {
7409          $r .= '<li rel="'.$status_key.'" role="presentation"><a href="#" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1">'.$status_icon_options[ $status_key ].' <span>'.$status_title.'</span></a></li>';
7410      }
7411      $r .= '</ul>';
7412      $r .= '</div>';
7413  
7414      return $r;
7415  }

7417  /**
7418   * Output JavaScript code to work with dropdown bootstrap element
7419   */
7420  function echo_form_dropdown_js()
7421  {
7422  ?>
7423  <script type="text/javascript">
7424  jQuery( '.btn-group.dropdown.autoselected li a' ).click( function()
7425  {
7426      var item = jQuery( this ).parent();
7427      var status = item.attr( 'rel' );
7428      var button = jQuery( this ).parent().parent().prev();
7429      var field_name = jQuery( this ).parent().parent().attr( 'aria-labelledby' );
7430  
7431      // Change status class name to new changed for all buttons:
7432      button.attr( 'class', button.attr( 'class' ).replace( /btn-status-[^\s]+/, 'btn-status-' + status ) );
7433      // Update selector button to status title:
7434      button.find( 'span:first' ).html( item.find( 'span:last' ).html() );
7435      // Update hidden field to new status value:
7436      jQuery( 'input[type=hidden][name=' + field_name + ']' ).val( status );
7437      // Hide dropdown menu:
7438      item.parent().parent().removeClass( 'open' );
7439  
7440      return false;
7441  } );
7442  </script>
7443  <?php
7444  }

7446  
7447  /**
7448   * Get baseurl depending on current called script
7449   *
7450   * @return string URL
7451   */
7452  function get_script_baseurl()
7453  {
7454      if( isset( $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] ) )
7455      { // Set baseurl from current server name
7456  
7457          $temp_baseurl = 'http://'.$_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
7458  
7459          if( isset( $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] ) )
7460          {
7461              if( $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] == '443' )
7462              {    // Rewrite that as hhtps:
7463                  $temp_baseurl = 'https://'.$_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
7464              }    // Add port name
7465              elseif( $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] != '80' )
7466              { // Get also a port number
7467                  $temp_baseurl .= ':'.$_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
7468              }
7469          }
7470  
7471          if( isset( $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'] ) )
7472          { // Get also the subfolders, when script is called e.g. from http://localhost/blogs/b2evolution/
7473              $temp_baseurl .= preg_replace( '~(.*/)[^/]*$~', '$1', $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'] );
7474          }
7475      }
7476      else
7477      { // Use baseurl from config
7478          global $baseurl;
7479          $temp_baseurl = $baseurl;
7480      }
7481  
7482      return $temp_baseurl;
7483  }

7486  /**
7487   * Get badge to inform the settings are edited only by collection/user admins
7488   *
7489   * @param string Type: 'coll', 'user'
7490   * @param string Manual URL, '#' - default, false - don't set URL
7491   * @return string
7492   */
7493  function get_admin_badge( $type = 'coll', $manual_url = '#', $text = '#', $title = '#' )
7494  {
7495      switch( $type )
7496      {
7497          case 'coll':
7498              if( $text == '#' )
7499              {    // Use default text:
7500                  $text = T_('Coll. Admin');
7501              }
7502              if( $title == '#' )
7503              {    // Use default title:
7504                  $title = T_('This can only be edited by users with the Collection Admin permission.');
7505              }
7506              if( $manual_url == '#' )
7507              {    // Use default manual url:
7508                  $manual_url = 'collection-admin';
7509              }
7510              break;
7511  
7512          case 'user':
7513              if( $text == '#' )
7514              {    // Use default text:
7515                  $text = T_('User Admin');
7516              }
7517              if( $title == '#' )
7518              {    // Use default title:
7519                  $title = T_('This can only be edited by users with the User Admin permission.');
7520              }
7521              if( $manual_url == '#' )
7522              {    // Use default manual url:
7523                  $manual_url = 'user-admin';
7524              }
7525              break;
7526  
7527          default:
7528              // Unknown badge type:
7529              return '';
7530      }
7531  
7532      if( empty( $manual_url ) )
7533      {    // Don't use a link:
7534          $r = ' <b';
7535      }
7536      else
7537      {    // Use link:
7538          $r = ' <a href="'.get_manual_url( $manual_url ).'" target="_blank"';
7539      }
7540      $r .= ' class="badge badge-warning" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="'.format_to_output( $title, 'htmlattr' ).'">';
7541      $r .= $text;
7542      if( empty( $manual_url ) )
7543      {    // End of text formatted badge:
7544          $r .= '</b>';
7545      }
7546      else
7547      {    // End of the link:
7548          $r .= '</a>';
7549      }
7550  
7551      return $r;
7552  }
